original_title: las imágenes cristal de nuestra ciudad
overview: When jacarandas bloom, the city of endless translations turns purple. The dreams of its inhabitants motivate movement. During midday, sunbeams unveil underground secrets. Overwhelmed by the complexities of the city, she dreams of being in a remote place
tagline: An homage to everyday life in Mexico CIty, its inhabitants and their dreams.
title: las imágenes cristal de nuestra ciudad
